Actions.Name: Crush
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage to weakened foes.

Combo.Name: Melding Mass
Combo.Effects: The [name] may rush 2 after this ability. Characters inside the [name] are shoved 3 in any direction.

Actions.Name: Wail of Terror
Actions.Description: The [name] releases a horrible shriek in a medium blast area effect. Foes in the area are weakened, and take 2 damage once for every foe in the area, up to a maximum of five times.
